resources.string: Welcome to Dutch Blitz Scorer!

Please note that you must own the physical Dutch Blitz card game for this app to be useful. 

This app is designed to make scoring for Dutch Blitz simpler. 

There are more instructions on the Info tab, but here are some quick tips: 
1. To start a new game, press New Game 
2. Configure your game settings and press Start Game to begin 
3. After each round of Dutch Blitz, press Record new round to record the scores 

If you need additional help along the way, tap the Help icon in the top right corner of the screen. It will provide specific help based on the screen you are on. 

The home page serves as a history for all games, where you can resume or review games. 

Enjoy!

Setup New Game Help

This screen is for setting up a new game. 

Give the game a name or leave it as the default. 

Choose the number of players. 
Note: Dutch Blitz normally only supports 4 players unless you own the expansion pack! 

Give each player a unique name. 

Then press Start Game to begin!
Game Scoring Help

This screen shows an overview of each round and each player's total score. 

To record a new round, use the Record new round button! 

To edit or delete a round, long press on the round that you would like to edit or delete. 

Generally, the game ends when the first player reaches a score of 75 or higher.
How to calculate scores?

A round is finished when a player plays their last card and yells BLITZ!
 
Scores are then calculated by: 
 1. Adding one point for each card the player has played in the Dutch Piles 
 2. Subtracting two points for each card the player has in their Blitz Pile 

Type in the score for each player in this app and press Save to record!
Empty player name issue
